Google Drive Sync is disabled (see Optio: Google Drive Sync is disabled (see Options)

Click to sync notes to and from Google D.mac: Click to sync notes to and from Google Drive (⌘ + R)
Click to sync notes to and from Google D.other: Click to sync notes to and from Google Drive (Ctrl + R)

Heading: Heading
Insert Image description: You can Drag & Drop an image to the note to upload it to Google Drive when Google Drive Sync is enabled.

Insert Link description.line1: The link can start with {{http}}, {{https}}, or {{chrome-extension}} if referencing another note.
Insert Link description.line2: See Shortcuts for how to open the inserted link.

Change selected text color to default te: Change selected text color to default text color
Font example: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog ({{font}})

Google Fonts.step1: Open {{website}} to see the available fonts
Google Fonts.step2: Type in the Font Name, e.g.: Roboto Mono

Orders description: When "Custom" is selected, you can Drag & Drop notes to change their order.

Shortcuts descriptions.Sync notes to and from Google Drive: Sync notes to and from Google Drive

Command palette detail.line1: By default, Command palette looks for notes by their name.
Command palette detail.line2: Type {{symbol}} first, and continue to start search for commands.
Command palette detail.line3: Type {{symbol}} first, and continue to start search for notes by their content.

Shortcuts descriptions.Open link in a New Tab: Open link in a New Tab
Shortcuts descriptions.Open link in a New Tab and make it activ: Open link in a New Tab and make it active

Enable Google Drive Sync detail.description: Creates a folder My Notes (automatically, once) in your Google Drive, and uses it to back up your notes. Notes are synchronized to and from Google Drive once the feature is enabled, and then on every click on the Sync now button in the Sidebar.

Why sync reasons.reason1: Having a backup of your notes (notes can be restored)
Why sync reasons.reason2: Can edit notes from other sources (Google Drive, My Notes, vice versa)
Why sync reasons.reason3: Can sync notes and edit them from other computers (by installing My Notes and using the same Google Account)

Permission details.detail1: My Notes can only access the files it created. It cannot see other files in your Google Drive.
Permission details.detail2: My Notes will request a permission to enable this feature.

Enable Google Drive Sync detail.Enable Auto Sync description: Auto Sync will automatically sync your notes to and from Google Drive every time you open My Notes, and every 6 seconds if your local notes were updated since the last sync.

Indent text on Tab detail.description: By default, Tab key changes focus between the address bar and a note. This can be changed to indent the text instead.

Options available.Open note on mouse hover: Open note on mouse hover holding {{key}}

Import notes from a ZIP file: Import notes from a ZIP file
